variables.input:
fetch logs
| filter message_type == "Error"
| sort error_message asc
| summarize collectDistinct(error_message)

fetch logs
| filterOut application_name == ""
| sort application_name asc
| summarize collectDistinct(application_name)

fetch logs //, scanLimitGBytes: 500, samplingRatio: 1000
| fieldsAdd strTenant=toString(environment_name)
| sort strTenant asc
| summarize collectDistinct(environment_name)

0.query:
fetch logs //, scanLimitGBytes: 500, samplingRatio: 1000
| filter contains(message_type, "Error")
| filter in(error_message, $Error_Message)
| filter in(application_name, $Application)
| filter in(environment_name, $Environment)
| fields Timestamp=timestamp, 
  Application=application_name, 
  RequestKey=request_key, 
  Message=content, 
  Stacktrace=stack_trace, 
  Host=server_name, 
  Environment=environment_name, 
  Tag=tags, 
  SessionId=session_id
| sort Timestamp desc

1.content:
### Error raw data
> Original Outsystems platform logs. Tabel can be filtered by clicking on items
